00021 /******************************************************************************
00022                         Includes section.

00024 #include <sysTypes.h>

00026 /******************************************************************************
00027                         Define(s) section.
00028 ******************************************************************************/
00029 #define MAC_BROADCAST_PANID       0xFFFFU ///< Broadcast PANID.
00030 #define MAC_BROADCAST_SHORT_ADDR  0xFFFFU ///< Broadcast short address, no association.
00031 #define MAC_NO_SHORT_ADDR         0xFFFEU ///< After association no short address.
00032 #define MAC_NO_EXT_ADDR           0x00ULL
00033 
00034 /******************************************************************************
00035                         Types section.
00036 ******************************************************************************/
00037 typedef uint16_t PanId_t;     
00038 typedef uint16_t ShortAddr_t; 
00039 typedef uint64_t ExtAddr_t;   
00040 
00042 typedef union
00043 {
00044   ShortAddr_t sh;
00045   ExtAddr_t   ext;
00046   uint8_t     raw[8];
00047 } MAC_Addr_t;
00048 
00050  typedef enum
00051 {
00052   MAC_NO_ADDR_MODE    = 0x00,
00053   MAC_RSRV_ADDR_MODE  = 0x01,
00054   MAC_SHORT_ADDR_MODE = 0x02,
00055   MAC_EXT_ADDR_MODE   = 0x03
00056 } MAC_AddrMode_t;

00062   #define IS_EQ_EXT_ADDR(A, B)    IS_EQ_64BIT_VALUES(A, B)

00064   #define IS_CORRECT_EXT_ADDR(A)  isCorrectExtAddr((const uint8_t *)&A)

00070   #define COPY_EXT_ADDR(DST, SRC) COPY_64BIT_VALUE(DST, SRC)

00075 /******************************************************************************
00076                 Inline static functions prototypes section
00077 ******************************************************************************/
00078 INLINE bool isCorrectExtAddr(const uint8_t *extAddr)
00079 {
00080   uint8_t i = 0U;
00081 
00082   do
00083     if (extAddr[i]) return true;
00084   while (++i < sizeof(uint64_t));
00085   return false;
00086 }
